title: Spotted: Hope Bikes High Pivot Prototype Enduro Bike + New Hope Tech 4 Levers?
content:
It’s time for the final EWS race of the season, and it just happens to be in Jessie-May’s backyard. After a six year break, the Vittoria Tweed Valley EWS is returning to Scotland’s network of epic trails around Innerleithen. That also means that Jessie-May didn’t have to look far to find some prototypes lurking around

The post Spotted: Hope Bikes High Pivot Prototype Enduro Bike + New Hope Tech 4 Levers? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
